data.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Get up an hour earlier every day to work on your dreams; success will find you before you know it.
data.author: Han Yang Lim

data.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
data.author: James Cameron

data.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
data.author: John Lennon

data.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
data.author: Anne Frank
